Column Description: Date for which availability and pricing information is recorded.
Indicates whether the listing is available on the specified date (t for true, f for false).
Daily rental price for the listing on the specified date (if available).
Often reflects the price adjusted for specific factors like weekend rates, seasonal changes, or demand spikes.
Specifies the minimum number of nights required to book the listing on that date. This can vary depending on season, events, or host preferences.
Sets the upper limit on the number of nights a guest can book on a particular date.
